meanings.definition: Velociraptors: a type of small, swift carnivorous dinosaur
meanings.sent1: The velociraptors roamed the prehistoric forest in search of food.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study velociraptors to learn more about ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The velociraptors decided to have a race to see who was the fastest dinosaur.
meanings.sent4: Her swift movements in the dance floor resembled the agility of velociraptors.
meanings.sent5: The children's book vividly described the velociraptors hunting for their next meal.

meanings.sent1: The velociraptors in the museum exhibit looked so realistic.
meanings.sent2: We learned about velociraptors in our dinosaur class at school.
meanings.sent3: The velociraptors on the shelf seemed to be having a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: The crowd of people moved quickly through the museum like a pack of velociraptors.
meanings.sent5: The movie scene with the velociraptors chasing the characters was intense.
